Interface Device

All Superinterfaces:
ControllerIO, SonarObject
All Known Subinterfaces:
Beacon, Camera, Detector, DMS, GateArm, GateArmArray, Gps, LaneMarking, LCSArray, RampMeter, TagReader, VideoMonitor, WeatherSensor
All Known Implementing Classes:
BeaconImpl, CameraImpl, DetectorImpl, DeviceImpl, DMSImpl, GateArmArrayImpl, GateArmImpl, GpsImpl, LaneMarkingImpl, LCSArrayImpl, RampMeterImpl, TagReaderImpl, VideoMonitorImpl, WeatherSensorImpl
public interface Device extends ControllerIO
Device is the base interface for all field devices, including detectors, cameras, ramp meters, dynamic message signs, etc.
Author:
Douglas Lau
